Game.Name: Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Monsters GX - Mezase Duel King (Japan)
Game.plot: Yu-Gi-Oh! GX: Duel Academy is a card battle game for the Game Boy Advance based on the Yu-Gi-Oh! universe. Climb the Duel Academy ranks as you find new friends and battle new monsters. The game features more than 1,200 of the latest cards, tutorials, and exams to strengthen your skills as a duelist, and it comes with three exclusive trading cards.Cheat: Card Passwords.On saturdays, go to the card shop and choose passwordmachine. Put in the following codes:Cheat: Unlocking Chancellor SheppardAfter achieving the rank of King of Games, a new room called Principal's Office will become available at the Duel Academy location. You'll now be able to duel with Chancellor Sheppard. Beware, as losing your first duel with him will knock your rank down to Prince of Games.Cheat: Unlocking Chancellor SheppardSubsequent duels with Sheppard will allow you to change your character's name after beating him.
